plot: This is a docu-drama series that makes us live and understand six major areas of bullying through unique stories of children aged between 11 and 17 years.
plot_en: This is a docu-drama series that makes us live and understand six major areas of bullying through unique stories of children aged between 11 and 17 years.
plot_es: This is a docu-drama series that makes us live and understand six major areas of bullying through unique stories of children aged between 11 and 17 years.
title: Intimidés
